0383bca28f665c7e3f3efc6c808b247c41369e56: Add that when the map is moved and the screen rotated, it does not go back to the marker but instead keeps the center stable.
2a07b1a990f1cb7732f3576c0027bd1894081ac7: Add that unused, empty plants are removed.
47acd706316a136710432e3a15e011f8f2c4064f: Change colors of buttons in map to fit app design.
bcd1df609b385b3b4f891e657732ccdab878cabe: Add country specific localization of the privacy policy.
51582b89cc2987c10bdb7af7f55e741bdf570b30: Add notification for download of markers.
e2eea1f61033fe5dd0641ea544e4d70c8cfa749f: Add maximum number of markers in Settings.
5d3846a879bb1bc0fcca4016b127742d74388715: Add to the changelog: Show which changes are new since the last update.
969e1e902d285a54c2969f0a31c0e399bbb87576: Add that users can now search for places on the map using OpenStreetMap's Nominatim service.
87aebdbbe0235e1b65a5508e21778286e31782de: Add zoom out to big locations like cities which were searched so that the map shows them 100%.
876f3643706b999164498cdb79f895e703662022: Add offline storage for used addresses.
49ee98cf1acc59441b01a2b9505cbdee367ff317: Update Privacy Policy to include Nominatim and ArcGIS World Imagery.
c370065a08cf78836e5e052912bdd331d634f143: Add progress circle when the search is running so users know when it is done.
8043699f99a2d8ce7d862f51d49f15ef1b7a360e: Fix the search of the main map. It would not open the map at the search location but now does.
1a81d2208e95ebff35ca2c3ba49d28fd8a45204e: Add the ability to upload plants to self-hosted servers using the na-ovoce.cz API.
13a52d003db6088b7cc445eec5fab04df5935514: Add a text if the search has no results.
607ff6a9c8c6d841ba407c15911e8ef4fea4fc42: Fix bug: The search order of the saved results is kept and not reversed.
53e5147d96104fc38180ee7c1139873524595e59: Add progress notification about marker download. The notification for the offline map download now tracks the progress.
7678cf6f2776d2c1700b30ce950276733b87b752: Add Upload to custom na-ovoce servers.
b9e24b8d70e44dccc03a3a5eb293ff112a87c881: Add the plants found with the app to the map.
0af19d18e616b43f0a47be12c9e813ff41c44856: Fix the updating of newly found plants on the map.
